text: "Fool to Cry" is a 1976 song by The Rolling Stones. It is the leading single from their album Black and Blue. It went to number 6 in Ireland and the United States, number 8 in the Netherlands and Norway, number 10 in the United States, number 11 in Canada, number 16 in Belgium, number 38 in New Zealand and number 45 in Australia. == References == Category:1976 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:The Rolling Stones songs
title: Fool to Cry
